Result Monad

Source: R/result.R
Result.Rd

Creates a Result monad instance which can be used with the flatMap operator %>>=%. See the Monads in R vignette for more details.

This container, when flatMapped, always returns a value, either of type Err (if an error was raised or the result was NULL), or Ok.

See also

Err(), is_err(), Ok(), is_ok()

Public fields

value

value contained in the instance

Method clone()

The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

Usage

Result$clone(deep = FALSE)

Arguments

deep

Whether to make a deep clone.
